cards.title: Picture of the day / Australia bowled over by afternoon tea
cards.rawTitle: Australia bowled over by afternoon tea

item.title: Sport picture of the day: Australia bowled over by afternoon tea
item.trailText: The Australian cricket team gather together for some English hospitality with afternoon tea during their run up to the Ashes
item.standFirst: The Australia cricket team gather together for some English hospitality with afternoon tea during their run up to the Ashes

displayImages.altText: L (L to R) Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood, Steve Smith, Mitchell Marsh, Chris Rodgers and Peter Siddle of Australia pose for the camera’s as they enjoy an Australian afternoon tea during the Australian Ashes Squad Welcome BBQ at The Kensington Roof Garden

headerImage.caption: (L to R) Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood, Steve Smith, Mitchell Marsh, Chris Rogers and Peter Siddle of Australia are welcomed to England for the Ashes with afternoon tea at The Kensington Roof Garden.  Photograph: Christopher Lee/Getty Images
headerImage.altText: (L to R) Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood, Steve Smith, Mitchell Marsh, Chris Rogers and Peter Siddle of Australia are welcomed to England for the Ashes with afternoon tea at The Kensington Roof Garden.
headerImage.cleanCaption: (L to R) Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood, Steve Smith, Mitchell Marsh, Chris Rogers and Peter Siddle of Australia are welcomed to England for the Ashes with afternoon tea at The Kensington Roof Garden.

image.altText: L (L to R) Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood, Steve Smith, Mitchell Marsh, Chris Rodgers and Peter Siddle of Australia pose for the camera’s as they enjoy an Australian afternoon tea during the Australian Ashes Squad Welcome BBQ at The Kensington Roof Garden
